az: my child is out there somewhere under the skies above waiting anxiously 4 u and me 2 bless it with our love a part of me a part of u and a part of this love we share will protect my unborn child who lives dormant out there somewhere sometimes in my dreams i imagine what it would be like how could i properly guide him when even i dont know whats right whether he is born in wealth or poverty there will be no deficiency in love i welcome this gift of life given from god under the skies above
